$eref.description: ManagementConfiguration properties supported by the OperationsManagement resource provider.

___template.description: The Json object containing the ARM template to deploy

___parameters.description: Parameters to run the ARM template

___parentResourceType.description: The type of the parent resource.

___applicationId.description: The applicationId of the appliance for this Management.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___properties.description: Properties for ManagementConfiguration object supported by the OperationsManagement resource provider.

$eref.description: Plan for solution object supported by the OperationsManagement resource provider.

___name.description: name of the solution to be created. For Microsoft published solution it should be in the format of solutionType(workspaceName). SolutionType part is case sensitive. For third party solution, it can be anything.

___promotionCode.description: promotionCode, Not really used now, can you left as empty

___product.description: name of the solution to enabled/add. For Microsoft published gallery solution it should be in the format of OMSGallery/<solutionType>. This is case sensitive

___publisher.description: Publisher name. For gallery solution, it is Microsoft.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___plan.description: Plan for solution object supported by the OperationsManagement resource provider.

$eref.description: Solution properties supported by the OperationsManagement resource provider.

___workspaceResourceId.description: The azure resourceId for the workspace where the solution will be deployed/enabled.

___referencedResources.description: The resources that will be referenced from this solution. Deleting any of those solution out of band will break the solution.

___containedResources.description: The azure resources that will be contained within the solutions. They will be locked and gets deleted automatically when the solution is deleted.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___properties.description: Properties for solution object supported by the OperationsManagement resource provider.

_88ArmTemplateParameter.description: Parameter to pass to ARM template

___value.description: value for the parameter. In Jtoken
